channel.title: I'm IP-Banned
channel.description:
I tried logging in today and it said my password was incorrect (it wasn't, I tried multiple times)
I then tried logging into an account named "asshole rule" instead of "asshole_rule" I typed /login "password" and then I was IP-Banned for having an invalid pass to many times.
I'd love to be un-IPed as I really don't think i deserve it.
I would appreciate my password being fixed/changed also.

item.title: I'm IP-Banned

X Entinity X:

Bump hunny, good luck.

Ty. I’m so booooorrrrrreeeeeeeeeedddddddddd.

item.title: I'm IP-Banned
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Moparisthebest:

It automatically bans you after X bad password attempts, why did you forget your password?

I didn’t

asshole_rule:

I tried logging in today and it said my password was incorrect (it wasn’t, I tried multiple times)

Can you just reset it for me?

EDIT: My password is the same password i use for mopar minus the numbers at the end, it just didn’t let me login.

Read full topic

item.title: I'm IP-Banned
item.dc:creator: @Debilitation Debilitation
item.description:
@Debilitation wrote:

I can vouch for asshole_rule here…

I was talking to him online, then he went on and off a few times and after that never saw him.
What I don’t understand is sir…

HOW DID YOU FORGET YOUR PASSWORD. Lmfao.

Read full topic
